title: Chelsea and Real Madrid agree fee for transfer of goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois
content: Thibaut Courtois is set for a move from Chelsea to Real Madrid pending a medical, after the clubs announced they had agreed to a deal on Wednesday.

title: Barcelona's signing of Arturo Vidal fails to impress as concerns persist
content: Arturo Vidal arrived in Spain on Sunday to pose for photographs for the first time since agreeing to become a Barcelona player.

title: Jose Mourinho, Manchester United must move past difficult preseason
content: Manchester United's players left Bayern Munich's Allianz Arena late on Sunday with more urgency than they had shown on the pitch in the team's soporific 1-0 friendly defeat to the German champions.
